resources.string:
Ebuy is an Internet e-commerce company.
We have 7 years experience in this area,we will provide you with fresh supply of vegetables,fruits,meat,dried food and cooked food.

With the powerful supply chain system and good reputation,we have cooperation with Singapore haidilao,Tanyu nearly hundreds of restaurants.
 
Ebuy is commited to satisfying consumers demand for shopping experience in quality food,providing consumers with good quality groceries and improving after-sales service. Ebuy is trying to become an online fresh grocery store that more and more consumers are trusted.Over the past few years, with the customers support,Ebuy has succesfully built a high-quality corporate image with high reputation and brand characteristics.
 
We will continue to strictly control food quality and provide consumers healthier,safer, more nutritious and more assured food.We are trying to get Singaporeans to enjoy the freshest and cheapest fresh food.

You have successfully applied the area -
We will open this area after the application amount reaches 10 people. Please feel free to leave a message and ask about our application process and wait for the good news.Thank You!
Follow our official WeChat account for updates on promotional Items and activities
1.You can scan QR code on receipt to pay by PayNow or PayLah.
2.We will handle your payment and display it on your order status within 24 hours.
Please fill in the referrer\'s phone number if applicable
Please transfer to our PayNow account, the payment status will change after we receive your bill. We will handle it within 24 hours.
Hint : If you select Paynow as your payment wasy,please transfer to our account below
We found that you have order to be delivered.Would you like to merge the selected products into your exisiting orders ?
1.We will merge products into your undelivered order if you pick the same delivery date.
2.Free home delivery is available if merged order meet the starting price.
2. Scan QR code on the left side of the receipt
3. Enter the four digits of the order number And enter the amount to be paid
1. Open bank app, click QR PAY
2. Select album to import QR images
3. Enter the four digits of the order number And enter the amount to be paid
Our company name is EASY TECH PTE. LTD.
Please enter first four digits of order no at reference no.
You can use Paynow or Paylah to scan the QR code
1. Scan QR code on the receipt and pay
2. Select QR code image from album and pay, please make sure you save QR image below to album first
3. Enter our UEN and pay UEN 201914427Z
1. Open bank app, click Pay Now
2. Click on UEN payment and enter the UEN number.Enter the four digits of the order number And enter the amount to be paid
1. This product is a weighing product.
2. The current display price is the standard specification price.
3. The final price is based on the weight of the actual product.
